name: Real Figma Surveys
description:
Turn your survey designs into real online surveys

------------------------------------------------------------

This kit contains a set of components that enable you to turn any survey design into a functional online survey.


Just install the weave.ly plugin, drag&drop pre-built components and start collecting answers in your custom designed survey.


Check out the Getting Started page for a walkthrough example


------------------------------------------------------------


If you're stuck, have any questions or general remarks feel free to reach out via info@weave.ly
